Name: Roommate
About the game: Roommate is a complete Visual Novel that puts you in the place of its characters. You will have multiple alternative routes and several roommates as pleasant as each other. This game contains two chapters. In the first one, You will play as Alvin who is in love with Naomi - his lovely roommate - but unfortunately in a relationship with a moron. You will help her break up or stay with him, but it will have consequences. For a duration of about an hour, this chapter is short but very cute. In the second one, you can choose your point of view between the roommates: - Issa, a kind and eccentric man - Amy, a shy young geek who loves video games - and Valerie, the lovely new roommate who will disrupt their routine For a duration of about 2-3 hours, this chapter is rather complete.
